incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and speak to others with words that were unbecoming of your Christian character, violating their dignity through thoughtless or hurtful language?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: for family needs or fulfill financial obligations
prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked financial resources entrusted to me for personal gain, potentially compromising my ability to provide for family needs or fulfill financial obligations?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: for excessive and wasteful entertainment or leisure activities that take precedence over my family needs
prodigality.question: Have I used my financial resources, such as income or assets, for excessive and wasteful entertainment or leisure activities that take precedence over my family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: such as sporting events or music festivals
over my financial responsibilities and family needs
prodigality.question: Have I excessively prioritized recreational activities, such as sporting events or music festivals, over my financial responsibilities and family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing private conversations or details about others
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing private conversations or details about others, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in practices , substances , or objects to prevent pregnancy
impurity.question: Did you intentionally engage in practices, substances, or objects to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.

impurity.question: Did you use substances, practices, or objects to prevent conception in your marriage?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
